text: The Latest from Paris is a 1928 American silent romantic drama film directed by Sam Wood and written by Joseph Farnham and A. P. Younger. The film stars Norma Shearer, George Sidney, Ralph Forbes, Tenen Holtz, and William Bakewell. The film was released on February 4, 1928, by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Cast == *Norma Shearer as Ann Dolan *George Sidney as Sol Blogg *Ralph Forbes as Joe Adams *Tenen Holtz as Abe Littauer *William Bakewell as Bud Dolan *Margaret Landis as Louise Martin *Bert Roach as Bert Blevins *Ethel M. Jackson *Della Peterson ==Preservation status== *The film survives, preserved by MGM, with only reel 4 missing.The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survivasl Catalog:The Latest from Paris == References == == External links == * * *Stills at silentfilmstillarchive.com Category:1928 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American romantic drama films Category:1928 romantic drama films Category:Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer films Category:Films directed by Sam Wood Category:American black-and-white films Category:American silent feature films Category:1928 drama films
title: The Latest from Paris
